message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a premium price of $15,000. I know it's valuable and I'm confident it can really benefit you.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a deal.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
